channel.title: Invision's (Remake) All about points
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://s1251.photobucket.com/user/invisionrs/media/94f5c1e7.png.html][IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh558/invisionrs/94f5c1e7.png[/img][/URL] Features: Gold4points Bosspoints system Prestige (coming soon) Over 8 bosses (or more) Bosses with correct anim 1 quest (more to come) 4 custom minigames correct special Dragonfire shield effects
Updates: 6/21/13 Added cursors Added better clan chat Started working on skills Added runecrafting added woodcutting 6/22/13 Started working on prestige system Flawless switching Fixed a few bugs Added working search button Added dominion tower 6/25/13 Finished adding prestige system Changed interfaces Made better looks player info Fixed boss system Added animated backgrounds Kinda added fullscreen (needs to fix transparent chatbox) Added remember username and pass Almost finished added skills Rewrote fishing skill Fixed bugs 6/26/13 Added clue scrolls Started on quests Fixed up some interfaces Added loyalty titles
Pictures: Gold4points Kill monsters, get coins and exchange them for gp(goldpoints), you can only exchange 10 coins at a time, if you want to keep gp you can also exchange them for other points such as, bosspoints, pkp, minigamepoints, dtpoints, etc
[URL=http://s839.photobucket.com/user/omgitzdanny/media/gold4point.png.html][IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz319/omgitzdanny/gold4point.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s839.photobucket.com/user/omgitzdanny/media/gold4points2-1.png.html][IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz319/omgitzdanny/gold4points2-1.png[/img][/URL]
Few spawns using gp
[URL=http://s839.photobucket.com/user/omgitzdanny/media/spawn2ong.png.html][IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz319/omgitzdanny/spawn2ong.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s839.photobucket.com/user/omgitzdanny/media/spawn1.png.html][IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz319/omgitzdanny/spawn1.png[/img][/URL]
Bosspoint system: Each time you kill a boss you would receive some points depending on how fast you kill it.
[URL=http://s839.photobucket.com/user/omgitzdanny/media/night.png.html][IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz319/omgitzdanny/night.png[/img][/URL]
Nex: Added in nex with correct anims Still need to finish the stages
[URL=http://s1251.photobucket.com/user/invisionrs/media/19a327ae.png.html][IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh558/invisionrs/19a327ae.png[/img][/URL]
Prestige: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dxh96FxGLcc&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] Prestige a current type of skill and you would receive 10 prestige points each time Interfaces that show prestige kill, prestige point, prestige level, and prestige shop Prestige shop interfaces [URL=http://s839.photobucket.com/user/omgitzdanny/media/prestige-1.png.html][IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz319/omgitzdanny/prestige-1.png[/img][/URL]
Minigames: So far Nazi zombies (custom made) kill 10, kill 25, kill boss and you would receive minigame points
[URL=http://s839.photobucket.com/user/omgitzdanny/media/zombie.png.html][IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz319/omgitzdanny/zombie.png[/img][/URL]
Future plans: Adding more minigames Finish some skills Add full screen Make a better gold4points interface Better clan system GrandExchange Player killing titles (like call of duty) Titles unlock Bounty hunter More quest (Some other dreams i had but forgot oh well...)
Development Team: Jaden - Main developer (Open) - Client developer (Open) - Client developer (Open) - Server developer (Open) - Server developer (Open) - Gfx artist
Applying: Position: Proof of work: Name: Skype:[/center]

item.title: Invision's (Remake) All about points

item.description:
@InvisionX wrote:

6/25/13
Finished adding prestige system
Changed interfaces
Made better looks player info
Fixed boss system
Added animated backgrounds
Kinda added fullscreen (needs to fix transparent chatbox)
Added remember username and pass
Almost finished added skills
Rewrote fishing skill
Fixed bugs

item.title: Invision's (Remake) All about points
item.dc:creator: @InvisionX InvisionX
item.description:
@InvisionX wrote:

Wow nice interfaces. The "Invision Gold System" Interface looks a little crowded (maybe because all of the coins.) Good luck.

thank you, yeah i know the interface is ugly i want to replace it but im not good at making interfaces.

Read full topic

item.title: Invision's (Remake) All about points
item.dc:creator: @InvisionX InvisionX
item.description:
@InvisionX wrote:

[center]
Features:
Gold4points
Bosspoints system
Prestige (coming soon)
Over 8 bosses (or more)
Bosses with correct anim
1 quest (more to come)
4 custom minigames
correct special
Dragonfire shield effects

Updates:
6/21/13
Added cursors
Added better clan chat
Started working on skills
Added runecrafting
added woodcutting
6/22/13
Started working on prestige system
Flawless switching
Fixed a few bugs
Added working search button
Added dominion tower
6/25/13
Finished adding prestige system
Changed interfaces
Made better looks player info
Fixed boss system
Added animated backgrounds
Kinda added fullscreen (needs to fix transparent chatbox)
Added remember username and pass
Almost finished added skills
Rewrote fishing skill
Fixed bugs
6/26/13
Added clue scrolls
Started on quests
Fixed up some interfaces
Added loyalty titles

Pictures:
Gold4points
Kill monsters, get coins and exchange them for gp(goldpoints), you can only exchange 10 coins at a time, if you want to keep gp you can also exchange them for other points such as, bosspoints, pkp, minigamepoints, dtpoints, etc

Few spawns using gp

Bosspoint system: Each time you kill a boss you would receive some points depending on how fast you kill it.

Nex:
Added in nex with correct anims
Still need to finish the stages

Prestige:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dxh96FxGLcc&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
Prestige a current type of skill and you would receive 10 prestige points each time
Interfaces that show prestige kill, prestige point, prestige level, and prestige shop
Prestige shop interfaces

Minigames: So far Nazi zombies (custom made) kill 10, kill 25, kill boss and you would receive minigame points

Future plans:
Adding more minigames
Finish some skills
Add full screen
Make a better gold4points interface
Better clan system
GrandExchange
Player killing titles (like call of duty) Titles unlock
Bounty hunter
More quest
(Some other dreams i had but forgot oh well…)

(Open) - Client developer
(Open) - Client developer

(Open) - Gfx artist
